1:
CIRCULAR 30 / 2000 
 
 
Subject: GUIDELINES FOR DEALING WITH THE MATTERS 
RELATED TO THE GENERAL AVIATION 
 
 
Security guidelines issued by this Bureau in respect of Scheduled / non-scheduled flings are 
equally applicable to the General Aviation.  All concerned are therefore; advised to ensure 
that the guidelines on aviation security issued by this Bureau from time to time are strictly 
implemented with regard to the General Aviation as well.  
 
 
(R.K SINGH) 
Addl Commissioner of Security (CA) 
for Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
NO.CAS-9(1) / 2000-DIV-I 
 
Dated : 03.10.2000
